ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed.sge
Class RemoteSGEBackend

java.lang.Object
  ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed.DistributedBackend
      ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed.RemoteDistributedBackend
          ibbt.sumo.sampleevaluators.distributed.sge.RemoteSGEBackend
All Implemented Interfaces:
JobFinishedEventListener, java.util.EventListener
public class RemoteSGEBackend
extends RemoteDistributedBackend
implements JobFinishedEventListener

This backend can submit jobs through a remote front end to a SGE cluster This class will also periodically check if a different queue is faster than the current one and switch.
